List of all members.

Public Member Functions

Labels

(BOOL) - axisShouldRelabel:
 Determines if the axis should relabel itself now.
(void) - axisDidRelabel:
 The method is called after the axis is relabeled to allow the delegate to perform any necessary cleanup or further labeling actions.
(BOOL) - axis:shouldUpdateAxisLabelsAtLocations:
 This method gives the delegate a chance to create custom labels for each tick. It can be used with any relabeling policy. Returning NO will cause the axis not to update the labels. It is then the delegates responsiblity to do this.

Detailed Description

Axis labeling delegate.

Member Function Documentation

- (BOOL) axis: (CPAxis *)  axis
shouldUpdateAxisLabelsAtLocations: (NSSet *)  locations 
[optional]

This method gives the delegate a chance to create custom labels for each tick. It can be used with any relabeling policy. Returning NO will cause the axis not to update the labels. It is then the delegates responsiblity to do this.

Parameters:
axis The axis.
locations The locations of the major ticks.
Returns:
YES if the axis class should proceed with automatic relabeling.
- (void) axisDidRelabel: (CPAxis *)  axis  

The method is called after the axis is relabeled to allow the delegate to perform any necessary cleanup or further labeling actions.

Parameters:
axis The axis.
- (BOOL) axisShouldRelabel: (CPAxis *)  axis  

Determines if the axis should relabel itself now.

Parameters:
axis The axis.
Returns:
YES if the axis should relabel now.
